description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Run as fast as you can to grab the gold! Enjoy playing with up to 4 other players in this button mashing competition featuring your avatar. Share you score online and see who's best. Beat the 110m hurdle world record! Master it with the 400m hurdle and compare your score with other people all over the world with the on-line leader board!
description.short: Run as fast as you can to grab the gold! Enjoy playing with up to 4 other players in this button mashing competition featuring your avatar.
